pages.about: About Estetica - Your Premier Destination for Beauty and Wellness Estetica Home About Us Contact Us Your Trusted Beauty Destination At Estetica, we are more than just a salon – we are your trusted partner in beauty. With our expert staff and comprehensive range of services, we are committed to helping you look and feel your best. Book a Beauty Appointment We are committed to providing you with the best beauty treatments and personalized care to help you achieve your beauty goals. Relax and rejuvenate in our tranquil salon environment, where you can escape the stresses of daily life and focus on yourself. Book a Beauty Appointment Our Commitment to You At Estetica, we uphold the values of integrity, professionalism, and excellence in everything we do. Integrity We operate with honesty, transparency, and ethical conduct, ensuring your trust and confidence in our services. Professionalism Our team consists of highly trained professionals who are dedicated to delivering exceptional service and results. Excellence We strive for excellence in everything we do, continually seeking to improve and exceed your expectations. Trust You can trust Estetica to provide you with the highest quality beauty treatments and personalized care. Learn More About Estetica Discover what sets Estetica apart and why we are the premier destination for all your beauty needs. Exceptional Beauty Services Indulge in our luxurious beauty services and experience the difference at Estetica. Personalized Attention Contact us now to schedule your appointment and experience the luxury of Estetica. Our Beauty Experts Our team of experienced beauty professionals is dedicated to providing you with the highest quality service and care. 2006 - 2010 Estetica Beauty Academy Gain hands-on experience and expert training at Estetica Beauty Academy. 2010 - 2013 Beauty Apprentice Start your journey in the beauty industry as a beauty apprentice at Estetica. 2013 - 2018 Senior Beauty Specialist Advance your career as a senior beauty specialist at Estetica, where excellence is rewarded and celebrated. 2018 - Present Head Beauty Consultant Lead the way in beauty innovation and customer service as the head beauty consultant at Estetica.  Estetica HomeAbout EsteticaContact UsPrivacy Policy © 2024 Estetica. pages.index: Welcome to Estetica - Your Destination for Beauty and Wellness Estetica Home About Us Contact Us Beauty and Wellness is our Top Priority Welcome to Estetica, where beauty meets wellness. Book a Beauty Appointment+91-874-6547895 We are dedicated to delivering high-quality beauty treatments that cater to everyone's unique needs. Indulge in our wide range of beauty services, designed to enhance your natural beauty and boost your confidence. 50% Experience the ultimate relaxation with our luxurious spa treatments and massages. 75% Transform your look with our professional hair styling and coloring services. Our Services for Your Beauty Hair Styling From trendy cuts to elegant updos, our experienced stylists will help you achieve the perfect hairstyle. pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - Estetica Beauty and Wellness Estetica Home About Us Contact Us Privacy Policy Welcome to Estetica Welcome to Estetica, your premier destination for beauty and wellness. Our Privacy Policy is designed to safeguard your personal information as we embark together on a journey of beauty and self-care, ensuring honesty and transparency every step of the way. Your privacy and trust are of utmost importance to us, and we are committed to delivering exceptional service while protecting your confidentiality. In today's digital age, we recognize the importance of privacy. Rest assured, we adhere to the highest standards of privacy protection, ensuring the security and confidentiality of your data throughout your Estetica experience. Furthermore, we are dedicated to providing a personalized and secure experience for each client, tailoring our services to your individual preferences. Our goal is to ensure you feel comfortable and confident when engaging with Estetica. We remain vigilant of technological advancements and changes in privacy laws, ensuring our practices are always up-to-date and compliant with industry standards. Our Commitment to Privacy At Estetica, your privacy is our top priority. We handle all information with care and transparency, striving to earn your trust through our actions. Our dedicated team upholds the highest ethical standards in safeguarding your personal data, ensuring your privacy is respected in every interaction. From your initial consultation to continued use of our services, you can rely on us to treat your information with care and respect, prioritizing your privacy at all times. Additionally, we are committed to transparency in all our privacy-related practices. We want you to understand how your information is collected, used, and safeguarded when interacting with our services. Our dedication to privacy extends beyond legal compliance; we continuously seek ways to enhance our procedures and further protect your data against cyber threats. Security Measures Estetica implements robust security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. We regularly assess and update our security protocols to ensure the highest level of data protection. Your security is our priority, and we spare no effort in safeguarding your privacy. Our security commitment involves investing in cutting-edge technologies and providing ongoing training to our team to enhance awareness of data security measures and ensure compliance with applicable regulations. Your trust in Estetica is paramount, and we are committed to maintaining the confidentiality of your information. Additionally, we conduct routine security audits and penetration testing on our systems to identify and address any potential vulnerabilities. We continuously monitor cyber threats and implement new security measures to ensure ongoing protection of your data. If you have any concerns about the security of your information, please don't hesitate to contact us. We are here to address your concerns promptly and efficiently. Transparency and Communication Transparency and open communication are core principles at Estetica. If you have any questions, concerns, or feedback about our Privacy Policy or practices, please reach out to us. We are here to assist you promptly and address any inquiries you may have. We are committed to keeping you informed about any changes to our Privacy Policy or terms of service. Updates will be posted on our website, and we may also notify you via email or other communication channels to ensure you stay informed. Your feedback is essential as we aim to enhance your experience with Estetica. Additionally, we encourage open and honest communication with our clients. If you have any concerns or suggestions on how we can improve our services or privacy policies, we would love to hear from you. Your input helps us refine our security and privacy standards. We are dedicated to responding to all your questions and concerns quickly and efficiently, ensuring you feel valued and heard as an Estetica client. Third-Party Links The Estetica website may contain links to third-party websites or services. These links are provided solely for your convenience and information. Estetica does not control these third-party sites and is not responsible for their privacy practices. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit to understand how your information is collected, used, and shared. While we strive to provide quality links to useful and ethical sites, we cannot guarantee the content or security of external websites. Please use discretion when browsing external links from our site. Additionally, we want to emphasize that we are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of third-party sites. If you choose to access these sites, we recommend carefully reviewing their privacy policies to ensure the protection of your personal information. As part of our commitment to transparency, we are available to answer any questions or concerns you may have about third-party links on our site. Your trust is important, and we are here to ensure you feel comfortable browsing our site and any sites linked from it. Children's Privacy Estetica does not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 years of age. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately so we can remove their information from our records. We are committed to protecting children's privacy and ensuring a safe online environment for all users. We encourage parents to monitor their children's online activities and educate them about online safety and privacy. Together, we can create a safer online experience for children and protect their privacy rights. Additionally, we are committed to educating our clients and their families about the importance of online privacy for children. We offer educational resources and helpful information on cybersecurity to help parents protect their children while browsing the internet. If you have any questions or concerns about the privacy of your children when using our services, please don't hesitate to contact us. We are here to provide guidance and assistance, ensuring you feel confident in your children's online security. Changes to the Privacy Policy Estetica reserves the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes or modifications will take effect immediately upon posting on our website. We recommend that you periodically review this Privacy Policy to stay informed about any updates. Your continued use of our site after the posting of any changes signifies your acceptance of those changes. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please discontinue using our site. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to maintaining the highest standards of data protection and privacy. Additionally, we strive to provide clear and transparent notification of any changes to our Privacy Policy. Our goal is to ensure you are fully informed about how your information is being protected and how any policy changes may affect your privacy. We are always available to address any questions or concerns you may have about changes to our Privacy Policy. Your trust is important, and we are here to ensure you feel comfortable with our privacy practices. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or practices, please contact us at Estetica@gmail.com. Your input is invaluable as we seek to enhance your experience with Estetica. The security of your data is paramount to us, and we are committed to providing a secure environment for all our clients. Please contact us for any assistance or feedback related to your privacy or security concerns. Your trust in Estetica is essential to us, and we are dedicated to addressing all your inquiries about our Privacy Policy or any other aspect of our services. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we are here to assist you in any way we can. For clarifications regarding the use or protection of your information, feel free to contact us anytime. We value your privacy and are committed to ensuring your personal data is treated with the utmost care and respect.  Estetica HomeAbout EsteticaContact UsPrivacy Policy © 2024 Estetica. All rights reserved.
pages.thank_page: Thank You - Estetica Beauty and Wellness body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #f7f7f7; margin: 0; padding: 0; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; flex-direction: column; } .container { text-align: center; max-width: 600px; padding: 20px; background-color: #fff; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } h1 { color: #333; } p { color: #666; margin-bottom: 20px; } .btn { background-color: #27a0b8; color: white; padding: 10px 20px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; border-radius: 5px; transition: background-color 0.3s; } .btn:hover { background-color: #1b5864; } Thank You for Choosing Estetica! We appreciate your patronage and hope you enjoy your beauty treatments. Return to Estetica
